preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored rename zones with duplicate names as (1) ZONE table does not exist, or (2) zone names are already indexed.

changeSet.comment: AHS-5260: Rename all zones with duplicate names.
changeSet.sql: update ZONE set NAME=NAME||' <ARCHIVED:'||ID||'>' where IS_ACTIVE=0 and NAME in (select NAME from ZONE group by NAME having SUM(IS_ACTIVE) > 0); update ZONE set NAME=(CASE WHEN IS_ACTIVE = 0 THEN NAME||' <ARCHIVED:'||ID||'>' ELSE NAME||'_'||ID END) where (NAME IN (select NAME from ZONE group by NAME having COUNT(*)>1));

update ZONE set NAME=CONCAT(NAME,' <ARCHIVED:',ID,'>') where IS_ACTIVE=0 and NAME in (select NAME from ZONE WHERE IS_ACTIVE <> 0); update ZONE set NAME=(CASE WHEN IS_ACTIVE = 0 THEN CONCAT(NAME,' <ARCHIVED:',ID,'>') ELSE CONCAT(NAME,'_',ID) END) where (NAME IN (select NAME from ZONE group by NAME having COUNT(*)>1));
